channel.title: My Science Blog
channel.description: Physics, statistics, and research powered by technology.

item.title: Introduction to High Energy Physics
item.description: What is high-energy physics, why accelerators matter, and a simple tour of particles and interactions.

item.title: Kolmogorov–Smirnov Test: A Gentle Guide
item.description: Intuition-first walkthrough of the K–S test, with use-cases in particle physics and goodness-of-fit.

item.title: Extended Likelihood for Signal vs Background
item.description: From counting experiments to continuous distributions—how extended likelihood improves parameter estimation.
